verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump [V: is] honoring Army 's football team at the White House and predicting the service branches of the military could have a new addition : the spa

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: honoring] [ARG1: Army 's football team] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] and predicting the service branches of the military could have a new addition : the spa
